TextView.android:text:
Oct, 2012 Nextbit is founded!

Jan, 201500000 Baton is launched on Cyanogen with Micromax

Sept 1, 2015 Nextbit launches a Kickstarter campiagn for the robin

Sept 2, 2015 Nextbit reaches its first stretch goal at Kickstarter ('KS'): $500,000

Sept 16, 2015 Nextbit duplicate its stretch goal at KS: $1M, and now a free Quick charger will be given to all backers! if $1.25M is reached a free midnight Nextbit shirt will be included and at $1.5M all backers will get 129GB of cloud storage!

Sept 17, 2015 Now, Robin has a Verizon Compatible Version, nice news for US fans! (Out of stock)

Sept 17, 2015 Nextbit starts a contest to get a new color for a Limited version of the Robin! #RobinColor

Sept 23 2015 Now, Robin has a Sprint Compatible Version, More great news for US Fans!

Sept 25, 2015 $1.25M stretch goal reached! Now t-shirts will be added to the package with the Robin and the QuickCharger! See pictures of them at the gallery!

Oct 1, 2015 Kickstarter campaign ended! Time of hype has just started!

Oct 21, 2015 Robin pre-orders go out at Nextbit.com! Shipping in Feb, 2016!
